name: J.H.Poddar
description: School management Phone App / school online ERP:  Empower students and teachers with teaching and learning tools using the phone app   What can you do in just 5 minutes everyday on the phone app? find here!  1. Take attendance of students and staffs in less than a minute.   2. Send absent report to parents in 10 seconds.  3. Share student fees structure with parents. Display report of paid, due and coming fees installments to parents  4. Send fee dues reminder to all parents in one click. this will take less than a minute.  5. Fees collection reports See fees collection reports on phone instantly. explore monthly, daily, class wise, transport, tuition fees instantly on your hand.  6. School events Invite parents for school events. Its fun to invite them with phone app.   7. Share school news, notices in one click with parents and students.  8. PTM Invite parents for parents teacher meeting. this is important for your school.  9. Exams dates Publish exam dates to students. Principal, please send your best of luck wishes to students.  10. Celebrate student birthdays and send them your best wishes.   This is a phone app for teachers, students and parents. you can send messages to parents, messages to students. this school phone app will help you to take attendance of students, staffs. help to manage leave of staffs, approve leave requests, send fee dues reminders to students and parents. send exams dates, school news, events, holidays updates, school notices to parents.   this is one platform for school to manage school daily activities.   school can do attendance, leave, salary, homework assignments, lesson plan, online tests,  important question papers, online courses just in minutes.   this is the best any school can offer to their students
